title: Is this FuturaBT?
content:
Hello everyone,

A client has sent me a packaging task that was previously created in Illustrator by another designer.  
Said designer has converted all type to shapes, and I can therefore not edit or ID this specific font.

It \*looks\* to me like FuturaBT. What do you say?

If anyone knows where I may be able to obtain FuturaBT fonts (preferably for free), can you kindly point me in the right direction?

Many thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415231542/http:/typophile.com/files/font_136.jpg) | 74.66 KB |
author: Nightshade

comments.content:
It certainly looks like Futura Book, although it may not be Bitstream's (BT).  
MyFonts has a few options for sale [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20120415231542/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/futura/fonts/#undefined).
